Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-compose for versions less than 2.17.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-compose is earlier than 2.17.3-3, affected by CVE-2023-45288
